tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255),
    participation_score FLOAT,
    interaction_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255),
    participation_status BOOLEAN,
    interaction_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE Students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    student_grade VARCHAR(10),
    student_age INT,
    student_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participation_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Not Participated',
    interaction_count INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE Discussions (discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                     student_id INT,
                     discussion_topic TEXT,
                     participation_status BOOLEAN)
